org.fujion.highcharts

Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.highcharts.Chart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier, OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter

    @Component(tag="hchart",
           widgetModule="fujion-hchart",
           widgetClass="HChart",
           parentTag="*")
public class Chart
extends BaseUIComponent
implements OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter
    Fujion wrapper for HighCharts component.

        public final Chart.ChartSettings options

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chart

        public Chart()
        Create default chart (line plot, single x- and y-axis).

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultColors

        public void setDefaultColors(String... colors)
        Sets the default colors for the chart's series. When all colors are used, new colors are pulled from the start again.
        Parameters:
        colors - List of default colors. If null or empty, the Highcharts defaults are used.

      • getType

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="type")
public String getType()
        Returns the chart type.
        Returns:
        The chart type.

      • setType

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="type")
public void setType(String type)
        Sets the chart type. This will remove any existing series.
        Parameters:
        type - One of the supported chart types.

      • getXAxis

        public Axis getXAxis()
        Convenience method for returning the x-axis. If there are no x-axes, returns null. If there are multiple x-axes, returns the first only.
        Returns:
        The x-axis.

      • getYAxis

        public Axis getYAxis()
        Convenience method for returning the y-axis. If there are no y-axes, returns null. If there are multiple y-axes, returns the first only.
        Returns:
        The y-axis.

      • addSeries

        public Series addSeries()
        Adds a new series to the chart using the chart's default type.
        Returns:
        The newly created series.

      • addSeries

        public Series addSeries(String type)
        Adds a new series to the chart using the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - The plot type.
        Returns:
        The newly created series.

      • addXAxis

        public Axis addXAxis()
        Adds an additional x axis.
        Returns:
        The newly added axis.

      • addYAxis

        public Axis addYAxis()

        Returns:
        The newly added axis.

        public void run()
        Build the graph on the client.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns true if a chart is currently running on the client.
        Returns:
        True if a chart is running.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all series and data points and destroys the client graph.

        Force a redraw of the chart.
